text:
Created attachment 33649
Active Threads Over time overvier during the run

Hi Team,

I am running my Jmeter2.13
I am running Jmeter endurance test for 24 hours via 3 Load generators without master machine.

After 3 hour of test I found local host (master machine) also taking part in firing the load which causes our test invalid.

For your information I am Using Jmeter 2.13 bundle with below plugins set
JMeterPlugins-Standard-1.3.1.zip,
JMeterPlugins-ExtrasLibs-1.3.1.zip, 

Please find below screenshots how stepup schenario is created and what is running .

FYI- Jmeter.properties doesn't has entry of localhost or 127.0.0.1

Also I trigger the test by remote start all and it ran fine till about 3 hours but after that users from my local machine master machine is also firing in the same way as from each LG.
creator: vikas7.jain@citi.com

text: Please provide the help as soon as possible, I will give all information you required
creator: vikas7.jain@citi.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
This Bugzilla is for reporting issues related to JMeter.
As such, problems involving 3rd party plugins are out of scope.

Please take this up with the plugin providers.
